attributes.action: reverse the decision to cut university funding by £398m
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britains universities are already underfunded. Many departments, especially science departments, have been forced to close in recent years due to lack of funding.

It is unreasonable to expect universities to educate more students with less money, as this government clearly expects.

Therefore this petition urges the Prime Minister to give universities the funding they clearly need.
